name: DEATH ROOM (monobovo01)
description:
Survive in a chaotic battle against enemies from inside and outside your room!
Move  your room using levers outside and maneuver with your player inside.

How to play:

There are two camera positions, one zoomed in and one zoomed out:

  1. In the first you can move the player character and shoot enemies
  2. In the second you can move three levers to change the velocity of the chains holding the room. one from side two side, and two to move each chain up and down.
    Time is also slowed while zoomed out.

To win you must survive all 5 waves while navigating around projectiles with your room and avoiding enemies.

Controls -

WASD - move
G - Zoom in / out
Mouse1 - shoot
